mapper.insert: insert into exam_question ( exam_question_no, question_no, question_hour, question_minute, question_second, question_content, question_name, etp_no, exam_no )values(#{exam_question_no},#{question_no},#{question_hour},#{question_minute},#{question_second},#{question_content},#{question_name},#{etp_no},#{exam_no})
mapper.select: select max(question_no) from exam_question where exam_no=#{exam_no}
